financial_benefits.description: Belize does not impose local income tax on foreign-sourced income for digital nomads.
Belize offers a relatively low cost of living compared to many Western countries.

lifestyle_benefits.description: Enjoy a subtropical climate with warm temperatures year-round.
Belize offers a high quality of life with beautiful natural landscapes and rich cultural diversity.

additional_benefits.description: English is the official language, making communication easy for most expatriates.
The country boasts rich cultural diversity and numerous outdoor activities such as diving, exploring Mayan ruins, and jungle hiking.

key_consideration: The Work Where You Vacation program allows remote workers to live and work in Belize for up to six months with no local tax on foreign income.
action_comment: Consider Belize for its affordable living, warm climate, and diverse cultural and natural attractions.
tagline: Work where you vacation in Belize.
tax_residency_trigger_details: You are considered a tax resident if you stay for longer than 183 days in a calendar year.

visas.key_consideration: The visa can be extended beyond the initial six months.

income_requirement.misc_details: Individuals must have an annual income of at least $75,000; for couples or families, the minimum is $100,000.

application_fee.details: Expected fee based on similar Temporary Residency visa; exact fee for Work Where You Vacation program not specified.

visas.renewability_details: The visa can be extended beyond the initial six months.
visas.permanent_residency_details: Digital nomad visa does not lead to permanent residency.

special_regimes.name: Digital Nomad Visa
special_regimes.benefit: No income tax on foreign-sourced income.
eligibility: Proof of employment, self-employment, or freelance work that can be done remotely.
Valid police clearance from the past 6 months.
Health insurance covering the duration of stay.

required_documents: Proof of employment outside of Belize (minimum annual income of $75,000 for individuals or $100,000 for couples/families)
Notarized banking reference and statement of account
Clear criminal record (no more than 6 months old)
Travel insurance policy (minimum of $50,000 of coverage)

visas.key_consideration: Long term visa options for stays exceeding one year.
